rooms.description: Spacious living room with exposed concrete elements and minimalist Brutalist decor. Vastu principles: south or west facing.
Functional kitchen area integrated with dining space, featuring modular fixtures and industrial finishes.
Practical ensuite bathroom adjacent to master bedroom with functional design, minimal plumbing fixtures.
Master bedroom featuring a dedicated en-suite bathroom and ample storage. Oriented in accordance with Vastu for privacy and energy flow.
Child bedroom designed for functionality and comfort, placed near the central courtyard for natural light.
Second child bedroom adjacent to the first, ensuring balanced energy distribution according to Vastu.
Dedicated home office space with ample natural light and ventilation. Designed as a quiet zone away from noisy areas. Focused on functional layout and ergonomic furniture placement.

openings.description: Sturdy, simple door leading to the central courtyard for easy access. Complies with local safety norms.
Access point to the central courtyard ensuring natural light and ventilation in adjacent rooms.
Balcony access from master bedroom for an open view of the surrounding environment. Designed to be cost-effective with reinforced concrete.
